title: Welcome to my website
text:
Welcome to my website



Hello! My name is Cloud Lee, and this is my personal website. I am a second-year student at SIT studying Applied Computing (FinTech).
I created this website to showcase my projects, experiences, and reflections on using GenAI tools for learning and project development.
I have a strong interest in:

Software development
Financial technology
Data analysis and visualization
Front-end and UI/UX design

This website showcases my academic journey, selected projects, and reflections on using GenAI tools in my learning.


‚ÄúLearning by applying knowledge to real-world problems.‚Äù

You can explore my projects, data visualization work, and reflections using the navigation bar above <3

title: Data Visualization: Stock Price Trends
text:
Below is one data visualization that I created during my student projects.
It shows numerical data plotted over time using a line graph.





This graph visualizes stock market price data over time.

The horizontal axis (x-axis) represents time, from November 2020 to May 2021.

The vertical axis (y-axis) represents the stock price, shown in numerical values.

Each point on the line shows the price of the stock on a particular day.

The connected line allows us to see how the price changes continuously over time.

This is a quantitative visualization because it represents numerical values (stock prices) and their changes over a period of time.




I created this visualization as part of a finance and programming-related student project where I was learning how to analyze real-world financial data. I used historical stock price data downloaded from an online financial API and processed it using Python.
The goal of the task was to understand how stock prices fluctuate over time and how trends, peaks, and drops can be identified visually. Instead of only looking at raw numbers in a table, plotting the data as a graph makes it much easier to see patterns, such as upward trends, sudden drops, or periods of high volatility.




I chose a line graph because:

It is the best way to show changes over time.
It clearly highlights trends, such as rising or falling prices.
It allows easy comparison between different time periods.
Financial data like stock prices is continuous, so connecting points with lines makes sense.

By using a line graph, viewers can quickly understand how the stock behaved during this period and identify important movements, such as when the price increased sharply or dropped suddenly.

This visualization demonstrates how numerical data can be transformed into a clear visual story, making complex financial information easier to understand.

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:
The primary GenAI tool I used for this assessment was ChatGPT.




I chose ChatGPT because it: - Helps structure content clearly - Explains technical steps in a simple manner - Assists in improving writing quality and formatting



ChatGPT supported me in: - Understanding how to configure Quarto and GitHub Pages - Structuring my website content logically - Improving clarity and flow in my written explanations
For example, it helped break down complex setup steps into clear, actionable instructions.




Saves time when organizing ideas
Helps refine existing content instead of rewriting from scratch
Useful as a learning companion when stuck





Requires careful checking to ensure correctness
Over-reliance may reduce independent problem-solving if not used wisely




I believe GenAI tools will continue to assist me in: - Debugging code - Drafting reports - Brainstorming project ideas - Supporting learning in technical modules
Overall, GenAI is a valuable tool when used responsibly to enhance productivity and understanding.

title: Project: Social Media Mobile Application
text:
This project involved designing and developing a social media mobile application aimed at enhancing user engagement and providing a seamless platform for sharing content.
The motivation behind this project was to simplify social media interactions such as posting updates and media, following friends and interests, messaging and notifications, improving accessibility and user experience.



I was responsible for designing the application flow and interface, implementing front-end components and ensuring usability and clarity in information presentation.




UI/UX wireframing tools
Front-end development frameworks (Flutter / JavaScript)
Basic backend integration concepts




Here is a short video demonstrating the application functionality:





Good UI/UX design significantly improves user engagement
Clear information architecture is crucial in social media platforms
User-centric design reduces confusion and increases retention

This project strengthened my interest in mobile application development and user-centered technology solutions.

title: Lee Yun Jia
text:
Music is an important part of my life. I am part of a band where we play and perform together. Being in a band has taught me teamwork, discipline, and how to communicate through music.
Each member of the band has a role, and we work together to create a balanced and enjoyable sound. Practicing regularly and performing with others has helped me become more confident and focused.

title: Lee Yun Jia
text:
Music is an important part of my life. I am part of a band where we play and perform together. Being in a band has taught me teamwork, discipline, and how to communicate through music.
Each member of the band has a role, and we work together to create a balanced and enjoyable sound. Practicing regularly and performing with others has helped me become more confident and focused.

title: Lee Yun Jia
text:
My Instrument ‚Äì The Saxophone
I play the saxophone, which is a wind instrument commonly used in jazz, pop, and band music. The saxophone produces sound when air passes through a reed and vibrates inside the instrument.
I enjoy playing the saxophone because:

It has a warm and expressive sound

It can play both melody and harmony

It is used in many styles of music

Learning to play the saxophone requires good breath control, finger coordination, and practice. Over time, I have improved my ability to read music, keep rhythm, and perform in front of others.

title: Lee Yun Jia
text:
My Recent Performance üé∑
Here is a recent video of me playing with the SIT band:

title: Lee Yun Jia
text:
Why Music Matters to Me
Being in a band has helped me grow not only as a musician, but also as a person. It has taught me:

How to work as part of a team

How to listen to others

How to stay committed to regular practice

How to perform with confidence

Music also helps me relax and express myself, especially when I am busy with schoolwork and projects.

title: Lee Yun Jia
text:
What I Hope to Achieve
In the future, I hope to continue improving my saxophone skills and performing with my band. I would like to play more challenging pieces and take part in more performances, both in school and outside of school.
Playing music is something I truly enjoy, and it will always be an important part of my life.
